'use strict';
 
var _classCallCheck = require('babel-runtime/helpers/class-call-check')['default'];
 
var _Object$keys = require('babel-runtime/core-js/object/keys')['default'];
 
var querystring = require('querystring');
 
var wait = think.require('await');
var awaitInstance = new wait();
 
//
var dbConnections = {};
//
var getDbItem = function getDbItem(value, index) {
  value = value || '';
  if (think.isString(value)) {
    value = value.split(',');
  }
  return index !== undefined ? value[index] || value[0] : value;
};
 
/**
 * 
 * @return {[type]} [description]
 */
module.exports = (function () {
  var _class =
  /**
   * constructor
   * @param  {} args []
   * @return {}      []
   */
  function () {
    for (var _len = arguments.length, args = Array(_len), _key = 0; _key < _len; _key++) {
      args[_key] = arguments[_key];
    }
 
    _classCallCheck(this, _class);
 
    this.init.apply(this, args);
  };
 
  /**
   * init
   * @return {} []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.init = function init() {
    var config = arguments[0] === undefined ? {} : arguments[0];
 
    this.sql = '';
    this.config = config;
    this.lastInsertId = 0;
    this.selectSql = 'SELECT%DISTINCT% %FIELD% FROM %TABLE%%JOIN%%WHERE%%GROUP%%HAVING%%ORDER%%LIMIT% %UNION%%COMMENT%';
    this.comparison = {
      'EQ': '=',
      'NEQ': '!=',
      '<>': '!=',
      'GT': '>',
      'EGT': '>=',
      'LT': '<',
      'ELT': '<=',
      'NOTLIKE': 'NOT LIKE',
      'LIKE': 'LIKE',
      'IN': 'IN',
      'NOTIN': 'NOT IN'
    };
  };
 
  /**
   * 
   * @param  {[type]} master [description]
   * @return {[type]}        [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.initConnect = function initConnect(master) {
    var hosts = getDbItem(this.config.host);
    //host
    if (hosts.length === 1) {
      return this.getConnection(0, this.connect, [this.config]);
    }
    return this.multiConnect(master);
  };
 
  /**
   * 
   * @return {[type]} [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.multiConnect = function multiConnect(master) {
    var config = this.config;
    var index = 0;
    var hostnameLength = getDbItem(config.host).length;
    //
    if (config.rw_separate) {
      if (master) {
        index = rand(0, config.master_num - 1);
      } else {
        if (isNumber(config.slave_no)) {
          index = config.slave_no;
        } else {
          index = rand(config.master_num, hostnameLength - 1);
        }
      }
    } else {
      index = rand(0, hostnameLength - 1);
    }
    var dbConfig = {
      user: getDbItem(config.user, index),
      password: getDbItem(config.password, index),
      host: getDbItem(config.host, index),
      port: getDbItem(config.port, index),
      database: getDbItem(config.database, index),
      charset: getDbItem(config.charset, index) };
    dbConfig = extend({}, config, dbConfig);
    return this.getConnection(index, this.connect, [dbConfig]);
  };
 
  /**
   * 
   * @param  {[type]}   index    [description]
   * @param  {Function} callback [description]
   * @param  {[type]}   data     [description]
   * @return {[type]}            [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.getConnection = function getConnection(index, callback, data) {
    var key = think.md5(JSON.stringify(this.config));
    if (!(key in dbConnections)) {
      dbConnections[key] = [];
    }
    if (dbConnections[key][index]) {
      return dbConnections[key][index];
    }
    var connection = callback.apply(this, data);
    this.linkId = dbConnections[key][index] = connection;
    return connection;
  };
 
  /**
   * parse set
   * @param  {Object} data []
   * @return {String}      []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseSet = function parseSet() {
    var data = arguments[0] === undefined ? {} : arguments[0];
 
    var set = [];
    for (var key in data) {
      var value = this.parseValue(data[key]);
      if (think.isString(value)) {
        set.push(this.parseKey(key) + '=' + value);
      }
    }
    if (set.length) {
      return ' SET ' + set.join(',');
    }
    return '';
  };
 
  /**
   * parse key
   * @param  {String} key []
   * @return {String}     []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseKey = function parseKey(key) {
    return key;
  };
 
  /**
   * parse value
   * @param  {Mixed} value []
   * @return {Mixed}       []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseValue = function parseValue(value) {
    var _this = this;
 
    if (think.isString(value)) {
      value = '\'' + this.escapeString(value) + '\'';
    } else if (think.isArray(value)) {
      if (/^exp$/.test(value[0])) {
        value = value[1];
      } else {
        value = value.map(function (item) {
          return _this.parseValue(item);
        });
      }
    } else if (think.isBoolean(value)) {
      value = value ? '1' : '0';
    } else if (value === null) {
      value = 'null';
    }
    return value;
  };
 
  /**
   * parse field
   * parseField('name');
   * parseField('name,email');
   * parseField({
   *     xx_name: 'name',
   *     xx_email: 'email'
   * })
   * @return {String} []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseField = function parseField(fields) {
    var _this2 = this;
 
    if (think.isString(fields) && fields.indexOf(',') > -1) {
      fields = fields.split(',');
    }
    if (think.isArray(fields)) {
      return fields.map(function (item) {
        return _this2.parseKey(item);
      }).join(',');
    } else if (think.isObject(fields)) {
      var data = [];
      for (var key in fields) {
        data.push(this.parseKey(key) + ' AS ' + this.parseKey(fields[key]));
      }
      return data.join(',');
    } else if (think.isString(fields) && fields) {
      return this.parseKey(fields);
    }
    return '*';
  };
 
  /**
   * parse table
   * @param  {Mixed} tables []
   * @return {}        []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseTable = function parseTable(table) {
    var _this3 = this;
 
    if (think.isString(table)) {
      table = table.split(',');
    }
    if (think.isArray(table)) {
      return table.map(function (item) {
        return _this3.parseKey(item);
      }).join(',');
    } else if (think.isObject(table)) {
      var data = [];
      for (var key in table) {
        data.push(this.parseKey(key) + ' AS ' + this.parseKey(table[key]));
      }
      return data.join(',');
    }
    return '';
  };
 
  /**
   * parse where
   * @param  {Mixed} where []
   * @return {String}       []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseWhere = function parseWhere() {
    var _this4 = this;
 
    var where = arguments[0] === undefined ? {} : arguments[0];
 
    var whereStr = '';
    if (think.isString(where)) {
      whereStr = where;
    } else {
      (function () {
        var oList = ['AND', 'OR', 'XOR'];
        var operate = (where._logic + '').toUpperCase();
        delete where._logic;
        operate = oList.indexOf(operate) > -1 ? ' ' + operate + ' ' : ' AND ';
        //safe key regexp
        var keySafeRegExp = /^[\w\|\&\-\.\(\)\,]+$/;
        var multi = where._multi;
        delete where._multi;
        var val = undefined;
        var fn = function fn(item, i) {
          var v = multi ? val[i] : val;
          return '(' + _this4.parseWhereItem(_this4.parseKey(item), v) + ')';
        };
        for (var key in where) {
          key = key.trim();
          val = where[key];
          whereStr += '( ';
          if (key.indexOf('_') === 0) {
            whereStr += _this4.parseThinkWhere(key, val);
          } else {
            if (!keySafeRegExp.test(key)) {
              console.log(key + ' is not safe');
              continue;
            }
            var _arr = undefined;
            // support name|title|nickname
            if (key.indexOf('|') > -1) {
              _arr = key.split('|');
              whereStr += _arr.map(fn).join(' OR ');
            } else if (key.indexOf('&') > -1) {
              _arr = key.split('&');
              whereStr += _arr.map(fn).join(' AND ');
            } else {
              whereStr += _this4.parseWhereItem(_this4.parseKey(key), val);
            }
          }
          whereStr += ' )' + operate;
        }
        whereStr = whereStr.substr(0, whereStr.length - operate.length);
      })();
    }
 
    return whereStr ? ' WHERE ' + whereStr : '';
  };
 
  /**
   * parse where item
   * @param  {String} key []
   * @param  {Mixed} val []
   * @return {String}     []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseWhereItem = function parseWhereItem(key, val) {
    var _this5 = this;
 
    if (think.isObject(val)) {
      // {id: {'<': 10, '>': 1}}
      var logic = (val._logic || 'AND').toUpperCase();
      delete val._logic;
      var result = [];
      for (var opr in val) {
        var nop = opr.toUpperCase();
        nop = this.comparison[nop] || nop;
        result.push(key + ' ' + nop + ' ' + this.parseValue(val[opr]));
      }
      return result.join(' ' + logic + ' ');
    } else if (!think.isArray(val)) {
      return key + ' = ' + this.parseValue(val);
    }
    var whereStr = '';
    var data = undefined;
    if (think.isString(val[0])) {
      var _ret2 = (function () {
        var val0 = val[0].toUpperCase();
        val0 = _this5.comparison[val0] || val0;
        if (/^(=|!=|>|>=|<|<=)$/.test(val0)) {
          // compare
          whereStr += key + ' ' + val0 + ' ' + _this5.parseValue(val[1]);
        } else if (/^(NOT\s+LIKE|LIKE)$/.test(val0)) {
          // like
          if (think.isArray(val[1])) {
            //
            var likeLogic = (val[2] || 'OR').toUpperCase();
            var likesLogic = ['AND', 'OR', 'XOR'];
            if (likesLogic.indexOf(likeLogic) > -1) {
              var like = val[1].map(function (item) {
                return key + ' ' + val0 + ' ' + _this5.parseValue(item);
              }).join(' ' + likeLogic + ' ');
              whereStr += '(' + like + ')';
            }
          } else {
            whereStr += key + ' ' + val0 + ' ' + _this5.parseValue(val[1]);
          }
        } else if (val0 === 'EXP') {
          // 
          whereStr += '(' + key + ' ' + val[1] + ')';
        } else if (val0 === 'IN' || val0 === 'NOT IN') {
          // IN 
          if (val[2] === 'exp') {
            whereStr += key + ' ' + val0 + ' ' + val[1];
          } else {
            if (think.isString(val[1])) {
              val[1] = val[1].split(',');
            }
            //
            if (!think.isArray(val[1])) {
              val[1] = [val[1]];
            }
            val[1] = _this5.parseValue(val[1]);
            //!=
            if (val[1].length === 1) {
              whereStr += key + (val0 === 'IN' ? ' = ' : ' != ') + val[1];
            } else {
              whereStr += key + ' ' + val0 + ' (' + val[1].join(',') + ')';
            }
          }
        } else if (val0 === 'BETWEEN') {
          // BETWEEN
          data = think.isString(val[1]) ? val[1].split(',') : val[1];
          if (!think.isArray(data)) {
            data = [val[1], val[2]];
          }
          whereStr += ' (' + key + ' ' + val0 + ' ' + _this5.parseValue(data[0]);
          whereStr += ' AND ' + _this5.parseValue(data[1]) + ')';
        } else {
          console.log('_EXPRESS_ERROR_', key, val);
          return {
            v: ''
          };
        }
      })();
 
      if (typeof _ret2 === 'object') return _ret2.v;
    } else {
      var _length = val.length;
      var rule = 'AND';
      if (think.isString(val[_length - 1])) {
        var last = val[_length - 1].toUpperCase();
        if (last && ['AND', 'OR', 'XOR'].indexOf(last) > -1) {
          rule = last;
          _length--;
        }
      }
      for (var i = 0; i < _length; i++) {
        var isArr = think.isArray(val[i]);
        data = isArr ? val[i][1] : val[i];
        var exp = ((isArr ? val[i][0] : '') + '').toUpperCase();
        if (exp === 'EXP') {
          whereStr += '(' + key + ' ' + data + ') ' + rule + ' ';
        } else {
          var _op = isArr ? this.comparison[val[i][0].toUpperCase()] || val[i][0] : '=';
          whereStr += '(' + key + ' ' + _op + ' ' + this.parseValue(data) + ') ' + rule + ' ';
        }
      }
      whereStr = whereStr.substr(0, whereStr.length - 4);
    }
    return whereStr;
  };
 
  /**
   * parse special condition
   * @param  {String} key []
   * @param  {Mixed} val []
   * @return {String}     []
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseThinkWhere = function parseThinkWhere(key, val) {
    switch (key) {
      case '_string':
        return val;
      case '_complex':
        return this.parseWhere(val).substr(6);
      case '_query':
        var where = think.isString(val) ? querystring.parse(val) : val;
        var op = ' AND ';
        if (where._logic) {
          op = ' ' + where._logic.toUpperCase() + ' ';
          delete where._logic;
        }
        var arr = [];
        for (var _name in where) {
          val = this.parseKey(_name) + ' = ' + this.parseValue(where[_name]);
          arr.push(val);
        }
        return arr.join(op);
    }
    return '';
  };
 
  /**

   * @return {[type]}       [description]

  _class.prototype.parseLimit = function parseLimit(limit) {
    if (!limit) {
      return '';
    }
    if (think.isString(limit)) {
      limit = limit.split(',');
    }
    var data = [limit[0] | 0];
    if (limit[1]) {
      data.push(limit[1] | 0);

  /**
   * join
   * @param  {[type]} join [description]
   * @return {[type]}      [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseJoin = function parseJoin(join, options) {
    if (!join) {
      return '';
    }
    var joinStr = '';
    var defaultJoin = ' LEFT JOIN ';
    if (think.isArray(join)) {
      (function () {
        var joins = {
          'left': ' LEFT JOIN ',
          'right': ' RIGHT JOIN ',
          'inner': ' INNER JOIN '
        };
        join.forEach(function (val) {
          if (think.isString(val)) {
            //
            var hasJoin = val.toLowerCase().indexOf(' join ') > -1;
            joinStr += (hasJoin ? ' ' : defaultJoin) + val;
          } else if (think.isObject(val)) {
            var ret = [];
            if (!('on' in val)) {
              for (var key in val) {
                var v = val[key];
                v.table = key;
                ret.push(v);
              }
            } else {
              ret.push(val);
            }
            ret.forEach(function (item) {
              var joinType = joins[item.join] || item.join || defaultJoin;
              // join tabsqlbuildSql
              var table = item.table.trim();
              if (/\s+/.test(table)) {
                if (table.indexOf('(') !== 0) {
                  table = '(' + table + ')';
                }
                joinStr += joinType + table;
              } else {
                table = options.tablePrefix + table;
                joinStr += joinType + '`' + table + '`';
              }
              if (item.as) {
                joinStr += ' AS ' + item.as;
              }
              //ON
              if (item.on) {
                var mTable = options.alias || options.table;
                var jTable = item.as || table;
                //
                if (think.isObject(item.on)) {
                  var _where = [];
                  for (var key in item.on) {
                    _where.push([key.indexOf('.') > -1 ? key : mTable + '.`' + key + '`', '=', item.on[key].indexOf('.') > -1 ? item.on[key] : jTable + '.`' + item.on[key] + '`'].join(''));
                  }
                  joinStr += ' ON (' + _where.join(' AND ') + ')';
                } else {
                  if (think.isString(item.on)) {
                    item.on = item.on.split(/\s*,\s*/);
                  }
                  joinStr += ' ON ' + (item.on[0].indexOf('.') > -1 ? item.on[0] : mTable + '.`' + item.on[0] + '`');
                  joinStr += '=' + (item.on[1].indexOf('.') > -1 ? item.on[1] : jTable + '.`' + item.on[1] + '`');
                }
              }
            });
          }
        });
      })();
    } else {
      joinStr += defaultJoin + join;
    }
    return joinStr;
  };
 
  /**
   * order
   * @param  {[type]} order [description]
   * @return {[type]}       [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseOrder = function parseOrder(order) {
    var _this6 = this;
 
    if (think.isArray(order)) {
      order = order.map(function (item) {
        return _this6.parseKey(item);
      }).join(',');
    } else if (think.isObject(order)) {
      var _arr2 = [];

        val = this.parseKey(key) + ' ' + val;
        _arr2.push(val);
      }
      order = _arr2.join(',');
    }
    return order ? ' ORDER BY ' + order : '';
  };
 
  /**
   * group
   * @param  {[type]} group [description]
   * @return {[type]}       [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.parseGroup = function parseGroup(group) {
    if (!group) {
      return '';
    }
    if (think.isString(group)) {
      group = group.split(',');
    }
    var result = [];
    group.forEach(function (item) {
      item = item.trim();
      if (!item) {
        return;
      }
      if (item.indexOf('.') === -1) {
        result.push('`' + item + '`');
      } else {
        item = item.split('.');
        result.push(item[0] + '.`' + item[1] + '`');
      }
    });
    if (!result.length) {
      return '';
    }
    return ' GROUP BY ' + result.join(',');
  };

  _class.prototype.pageToLimit = function pageToLimit(options) {
    options = options || {};
    //pagelimit

      var page = options.page + '';
      var listRows = 0;

        page = page.split(',');
        listRows = page[1] | 0;
        page = page[0];
      }
      page = parseInt(page, 10) || 1;
      if (!listRows) {
        listRows = isNumberString(options.limit) ? options.limit : think.config('db_nums_per_page');
      }
      var offset = listRows * (page - 1);
      options.limit = offset + ',' + listRows;
    }
    return options;
  };

  /**
   * 
   * @param  {[type]} str [description]
   * @return {[type]}     [description]
   */
 
  _class.prototype.escapeString = function escapeString(str) {
    if (!str) {
      return '';
    }
    return str.replace(/[\0\n\r\b\t\\\'\"\x1a]/g, function (s) {
      switch (s) {
        case '\u0000':
          return '\\0';
        case '\n':
          return '\\n';
        case '\r':
          return '\\r';
        case '\b':
          return '\\b';
        case '\t':
          return '\\t';
        case '\u001a':
          return '\\Z';
        default:
          return '\\' + s;
      }
    });
  };

  _class.prototype.bufferToString = function bufferToString(data) {
